Ogah Dibilang Pansos, Alasan Melly Goeslaw Enggan Diwawancara
03 Nov 2019, 02:25 by Tempo.co, Istiqomatul Hayati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Musisi Melly Goeslaw mengungkapkan alasannya tidak mau diwawancara media terkait kemarahannya terhadap selebritas yang merisaknya dalam Pesta Halloween pada 31 Oktober lalu. Hal ini ditunjukkan dalam video klarifikasi yang diunggahnya di akun Instagramnya pada Sabtu, 2 November 2019.
“Saya takut banget dianggap pansos (panjat sosial) atau mungkin dianggap lagi cari sensasi, karena kebetulan band saya lagi mengeluarkan album baru. Saya takut itu terjadi, padahal intinya bukan itu,” ujarnya. Saat ini, Potret, band lama milik Melly dan suaminya, tengah mengeluarkan album baru setelah sekian lama vakum.
Melly menuturkan, saat pesta Halloween itu, ia juga berada di gedung yang sama. Ia berada di sana untuk makan malam. Acara pesta Halloween itu berada di lantai 3. “Saya juga enggak diundang, itu pertama. dan kedua saya tidak tertarik dengan acara itu,” katanya.
Istri Anto Hoed ini menjelaskan, saat itu, ia bertemu dengan beberapa orang yang berkostum dan berdandan ala setan dan ala tokoh-tokoh fiktif, seperti joker, wonder women, dan cat women. "Karena itu acara Halloween, saya tersinggung kenapa menampilkan seseorang yang sudah berhijab. Itu sama sekali tidak baik."
Pencipta lagu-lagu hits milik Krisdayanti, Rossa, dan Bunga Citra Lestari atau BCL itu menjelaskan, selama ini penampilan uniknya tidak pernah asal-asalan. Ia mengaku banyak didukung untuk tampil unik dan nyentrik. Salah satunya dari perancang busana Rinaldy A Yunardi.
"Jadi kenapa saya di-present seperti pocong hitam cuma dipakaikan rok, terus pakai hijab, terus pakai topi yang tidak representatif sebagai saya, tidak mirip saya sama sekali."
Melly merasa makin kecewa saat mengetahui ia menjadi bahan tertawaan orang-orang yang ia cintai. "Saya support kariernya, saya banggakan, saya selalu bilang mereka cantik. Saya diketawain. Saya sakit hati. Saya enggak terima hal itu," ujarnya.
Melly sendiri tak lama setelah melihat tayangan instastory milik Bimo Permadi, langsung mengungkapkan kemarahannya dengan menyebut nama-nama mereka yang terlihat. Ia menyebut nama Rossa, BCL, Vidi Aldiano, dan Bubah Alfian.
Rossa, Vidi, dan Bubah langsung meminta maaf melalui media sosial mereka. Adapun BCL hingga saat ini tidak meminta maaf di media sosialnya hingga membuatnya mendapat kecaman dari netizen.

Reluctant to be called the Committee, the reason Melly Goeslaw was reluctant to be interviewed
03 Nov 2019, 02:25 by Tempo.co, Istiqomatul Hayati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Musician Melly Goeslaw revealed her reasons for not wanting to be interviewed by the media in relation to her anger towards celebrities who cracked her up at the Halloween Party on 31 October. This is shown in the clarification video that he uploaded on his Instagram account on Saturday, November 2, 2019.
"I'm really afraid that I will be considered social media (social climbing) or it might be considered a sensation, because by chance my band is releasing a new album. I am afraid that happens, even though the point is not that, "he said. Currently, Portrait, an old band owned by Melly and her husband, is releasing a new album after a long vacuum.
Melly said, during the Halloween party, she was also in the same building. He was there for dinner. The Halloween party was on the 3rd floor. "I wasn't invited either, that was first. and secondly I am not interested in the program, "he said.
Anto Hoed's wife explained, at that time, he met some people who were costumed and dressed in devil style and fictional characters, such as joker, wonder women, and cat women. "Because it was a Halloween event, I was offended why it featured someone who had already worn the hijab. That was not good at all."
The creator of Krisdayanti's hits songs, Rossa, and Bunga Citra Lestari or BCL explained, so far his unique appearance has never been careless. He claimed many supported to appear unique and quirky. One of them is from fashion designer Rinaldy A Yunardi.
"So why am I being presented like a black pocong wearing only a skirt, continuing to wear the hijab, continuing to wear a hat that is not as representative as me, not like me at all."
Melly felt even more disappointed when she found out she was the laughing stock of the people she loved. "I support his career, I am proud, I always said they were beautiful. I was laughed at. I was hurt. I did not accept that," he said.
Melly herself shortly after seeing Bimo Permadi's instastory show, immediately expressed her anger by mentioning the names of those who were seen. He mentioned the names Rossa, BCL, Vidi Aldiano, and Bubah Alfian.
Rossa, Vidi, and Bubah immediately apologized through their social media. The BCL so far has not apologized on social media to get it criticized by netizens.
